title: Drawing, "Hardware for Bedroom Suite # 9007", September 11, 1935
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 6396/1"-1-0/F.S./WESTY/D./9/11/35, 9/11/35, 2, SL./1, OFFICE; materials, dimensions, and instructions in graphite
description: Elevations and plans for hardware for suite of bedroom furniture, # 9007. Suite includes dresser, chest, dressing table, two night stands, and mirror. Pull is casted chrome, with rounded front; square in overall shape.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Hardware for Bedroom Suite # 9007", September 11, 1935.
September 11, 1935. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-919.
